General.Name: Savior Lifetec
General.Description: Savior Lifetec Corporation, a specialty injectable company, develops, produces, and supplies sterile active pharmaceutical ingredients and finished dosage formulations. The company offers various products, such as paliperidone palmitate, cetrorelix and ganirelix acetate, plecanatide, prucalopride succinate, and brinzolamide. It also provides imipenem and cilastatin, meropenem, and ertapenem products. Savior Lifetec Corporation was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Miaoli County, Taiwan.

1.Name: Ms. Emma  Wang
1.Title: Assistant VP, Fin. Mang., Corp. Governance Mang. & Accounting Officer
